Deployments.ReleaseNotes:
Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Nada

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Support for FSX Play
			Session/Video files must be captured with Play running as they are deleted after the session is completed
		Session Monitoring To Copy Content to Local GST Folder
			Each simulation software has different behaviors, but long term plan for analytics can be spread across sessions from multiple softwares when the data is local to GST
				FSX 2020 Session Files will be available after uninstall/re-install
				FSX 2020 Swing Video files will be available after ending session (known bug - v8.8.0.15)
				FSX Play Session Files will be available after ending each session
				FSX Play Swing Video files will be avilable after exiting Play
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Automatic Session Monitoring Enabled
			Can be turned off in Settings, but recommended to automatically capture data local for future reference/analytics and also required for some sim softwares
		Catalog File Structure Changed to Year -> Month -> Day
			All Exported and Copied content is now stored in a date cataloged directory layout for future reference
		GST Demo now Simulation Software selection
			Also Default Simulation Software selection when first running GST
		Play sound for last shot loaded from session monitoring
	Tuning:
		Processing a new shot with Session Monitoring and a Video Export running will now process the entire swing video(s)
			Doing this is not recommended, but if your system has enough horsepower, yrmv

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Support for FSX Play
			Session/Video files must be captured with Play running as they are deleted after the session is completed
		Session Monitoring To Copy Content to Local GST Folder
			Each simulation software has different behaviors, but long term plan for analytics can be spread across sessions from multiple softwares when the data is local to GST
				FSX 2020 Session Files will be available after uninstall/re-install
				FSX 2020 Swing Video files will be available after ending session (known bug - v8.8.0.15)
				FSX Play Session Files will be available after ending each session
				FSX Play Swing Video files will be avilable after exiting Play
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Automatic Session Monitoring Enabled
			Can be turned off in Settings, but recommended to automatically capture data local for future reference/analytics and also required for some sim softwares
		Catalog File Structure Changed to Year -> Month -> Day

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Support for FSX Play
			Session/Video files must be captured with Play running as they are deleted after the session is completed
		Session Monitoring To Copy Content to Local GST Folder
			Each simulation software has different behaviors, but long term plan for analytics can be spread across sessions from multiple softwares when the data is local to GST
				FSX 2020 Session Files will be available after uninstall/re-install
				FSX 2020 Swing Video files will be available after ending session (known bug - v8.8.0.15)
				FSX Play Session Files will be available after ending each session
				FSX Play Swing Video files will be avilable after exiting Play
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Automatic Session Monitoring Enabled
			Can be turned off in Settings, but recommended to automatically capture data local for future reference/analytics and also required for some sim softwares
		Catalog File Structure Changed to Year -> Month -> Day
			All Exported and Copied content is now stored in a date cataloged directory layout for future reference
		GST Demo now Simulation Software selection
			Also Default Simulation Software selection when first running GST
		Play sound for last shot loaded from session monitoring
	Tuning:
		Processing a new shot with Session Monitoring and a Video Export running will now process the entire swing video(s)
			Doing this is not recommended, but if your system has enough horsepower, yrmv
Debug Test 2

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		GST Session Loading
			Add Replay Indicator to Session List and Shot Data
				Updated session entry now includes "REPLAY" if a shot replay exists for any shot in the session
				Updated the Shots table to include a "Replay" column to indicate if the shot has an associated replay file
		Record Swing Videos
			Camera Recording Quality and Performance 
				Quality and performance increases with changes to encoding and video settings that reduce video processing times, file size, and system performance impact
		Swing Video End Offset
			Enhanced Controls
				Bigger font for video offset settings
				Video end offset right-click context menu now includes: +/- 10, +/- 100 (frames)
				Video end offset will now always be 1 higher than start offset
				Video end offset values cannot be changed while paused during playback
				Video end offset settings are now saved to the session/shot permanently
	Tuning:
		Video Sync Offset Controls
			Stepping/jumping forward no longer pushes the end frame offset value. You cannot step/jump past the end offset
		Video Playback
			When a small end offset is applied, looped playback now restarts the video from the beginning

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Video Export
			Quality and performance increases with changes to encoding and video settings to reduce export times by roughly 38% while gaining better playback compatibility
		Shot Replay Recording
			Quality settings now match Video Export settings to increase replay quality and less of a performance hit while recording
	Tuning:
		Club Data
			Club data fields are now being displayed in the datagrid when value doesn't have a decimal (i.e. Angle of Attack: 1 UP)

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - PRO:
		Shot Visualization - Data Tiles
			The GST Shot Visualizer now has a Data Tiles menu where you can add any data tile you want, save them as a preset, or open saved presets!
				You can also delete and rename presets as needed					
	Tuning:
		Video Export - Shot Replay
			Shot replay videos recorded in the GST Shot Visualizer will now export with swing videos when recorded at full screen (maximized)

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - PRO:
		Video Export Playback Speed
			In the Export Options you can now set the playback speed to be used for video export
				This setting will persist until you restart GST
			You can also set the export speed of each video you have configured individually
				For example, you can slow one video down over the rest
	Tuning:
		Settings Menu
			License check now required when clicking on Configure Golf Bag
			Added link to Configure Player Names
		Session Monitoring
			Camera and Recording Replay will be disarmed if Session Monitoring is turned off
			Recording Replay cannot be started if Session Monitoring is turned off
		Export Options
			Menu can now be closed with Escape key
			Settings now persist until you restart GST
			You can now de-select all data fields to export videos without data
		Video Export
			Data tiles are now correctly scaled when not exporting all fields

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Set Custom Session Player Name
			New UI option to set and override player name as shots come in
			You can also right-click on the Session Player Name (under Session Data) and change the name to any in your player list, or open the Configure Player Names window to add, rename, and/or select a player name
				You can also restore the original recorded player name if needed

	New Features - PRO:
		Record Shot Visualization as a Shot Replay On Demand
			The GST Shot Visualizer now has a record button that will play and record the shot currently loaded, and it will be automatically added as a shot replay
				Missed the simulator replay? Now you can capture the flight whenever you want, at any angle you want!
					If you already have a shot replay captured for that shot, you will see a warning to overwrite before proceeding

	Tuning:
		Configure Golf Bag
			Minimize and Maximize buttons have been removed
		Shot Replay
			The shot replay video playback will no longer be stopped short when no End At value is set
		Video Playback
			The right-click context menu of any video will now take you to where they are if you click the path value (new icon added)

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Bug Fixes:
		Video Export
			Swing video 3 can now be exported by itself
	Tuning:
		Configure Swing Video Quantity
			The warning for not having the correct number of videos configured will no longer be shown twice if the selected shot isn't the first

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Automatically Load Recorded Shot Replays
			If a replay is recorded during a shot, when it's ready, the replay will now be automatically loaded for that shot
			If you select a shot and a GST recorded replay is available, the replay will now be automatically loaded for that shot
			If a shot replay is loaded and there are no swing videos for that shot, the Append To Export flag will automatically be set
		Configure Swing Video Quantity
			A new user setting (Settings -> Configure Swing Video(s)) that replaces "Include 3rd Video" will let you choose how many swing videos you want to see
				If you don't have any cameras or want to add your own video clips, just select "None" to use Shot Replays only
	Tuning:
		Video Export - Shot Replay Only
			The prompt for exporting a shot replay by itself will no longer show up when there are no swing videos for the shot

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Feedback form now supports attaching a GST log file
	Tuning:
		Record Replay
			Loading Video Players message no longer shown after downloading video dependencies for the first time
		Video Export
			Shot replay exported by itself (no swing videos marked for export) will now use replay start/end trim values (if set)
		Select Shot Replay
			Directory will default to the shot_replay folder of the current sim software for today (if exists) - Else it will move up the directory structure to the next folder available
		Set Video 1-3
			Directory will default to the swing_video folder of the current sim software for today (if exists) - Else it will move up the directory structure to the next folder available
		GST Log Files
			New setting added (Setting -> Log Level) to change the GST logging level to Warning (Temporary) for issue troubleshooting

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - PRO:
		Automatic Shot Replay Capture
			New Record Replay button will automatically record and capture the next shot to a video file
				You can select the file via Load Replay to add to your shot export (Append To Export)
					Check: golf_simulator_toolkit\simulation_software\{SIM}\SHOT_REPLAY\{YYYY}\{MM}\{DD}\{DateOfShot}_shot_replay.mkv
			Right click on the Record Replay to select a different screen to record (if not using Main screen)
	Tuning:
		Shot Visualization
			Updated view preset starting zoom levels
			Stats are now a lot bigger and easier to read
			Stats will now stay visible at any zoom level
		License Request for Windows 11 Users
			Replaced deprecated mechanism with one to support recently patched Windows 11 systems
		Custom FSX 2020 install location support
			New menu item under Settings -> Simulation Software -> FSX 2020 to set custom installation path and executable

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - PRO:
		Shot Visualization
			Now you can open a dedicated window to see the visual representation of the ball flight along with Carry, Peak Height and Offline values (values are direct from selected Simulation Software)
			Several view presets have been added to see the shot from different angles
			The Play button will show the flight in motion
			You can set the playback speed to be slower or faster than real time (100% - default)
			Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out and you can also click and drag to customize the view however you like
			Note: GST is drawing it's own ball flight path, so it might not match your selected simulation software exactly

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Feedback form now supports attaching an image
	Tuning:
		Main screen UI small tweaks

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Video Export
			A new "Export Options" button is available to select which shot data fields to include (or exclude) from video export. Choice will be remembered for the duration of the GST session
	Tuning:
		Session Stats
			Export Options window gets an Icon

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Auto Video Playback
			When the button is enabled, after any shot is loaded, swing video playback will start automatically
	Tuning:
		Video Playback
			All new videos for a shot will now be displayed at the same time, instead of when they come in
		Record Swing Videos
			Optimized video recording post-processing cleanup
		GST Dialog Popups
			FSX Play Practice "shot order warning" can now be permanently suppressed

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - PRO:
		Record Swing Videos
			You can now record video in GST by arming up to 3 cameras (in "Configure DirectShow Camera" menu) at any supported resolution and frame rate of your camera(s)
			There are currently 3 recording methods to choose from based on your system performance, but the default "MP4 Video (Hybrid)" doesn't use the most memory and video processing is a bit faster
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Configure DirectShow Camera
			Camera preview is now available!
			A "Detect Cameras" button will now refresh your camera list if you need to reconnect one
		Video Playback/Sync
			Added swing video end trim capability. Currently just a raw frame number count - Reduce the end frame number to trim as needed
	Tuning:
		GST Session Loading
			Only session/swing videos that have been updated or don't exist will be copied during "Load Sessions" instead of all for the current day

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Session Stats
			You now have the ability to change the Club/Ball override value from the Stats window (for valid license holders)
				Club/Ball Override still needs to be initiated from the main form
			The AVG and STDEV rows are now consolidated into one row
				The STDEV data will be shown under the average value (if there is more than one shot per group)
				The ID cell of the AVG row will now have a color for the group that matches that in the chart/legend
			Export
				New export option to exclude the ALL row
				New export option to exclude data column(s) â€“ Create your own Shot Matrix / Caddy Card!
				Export options will now be remembered for the duration of the stats window
	Tuning:
		Session Stats
			Horizontal scrollbar added when the Stats window is resized smaller than the buttons
			The color assigned to each shot group will remain constant, not shifting to another group after filtering/disabling shots
		Session Stats Export
			The legend of a PNG image export will now show all values if there are more than the current width will allow

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Bug Fixes:
		Reloading stats screen with all disabled shots no longer shows empty stats row or exports empty data
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Session Stats - Shots Table
			A new Shot Grouping button will group all shots by shot id (default) or Carry
				Shot grouping by Shot ID has been optimized to keep groups together in order when cycling through club/balls (i.e. playing a hole)
				Any shot grouping will be turned off if sorting by Club/Ball and grouping state restored when re-grouping
				Use Carry grouping for gap testing or rankings to see highest Carry values first
	Tuning:
		Session Stats - Shots Table
			Shot sorting by Club or Ball columns now honors the "names" of each to sort correctly by alpha

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - PRO:
		Video Sync
			Video sync offset settings for all original videos are now saved per shot
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		GST Upgrades
			Cumulative release notes are now shown if several versions behind the latest
		GST Menu
			Added custom altitude % adjustment to use for Stats Altitude Adjustment
				Use to override the default 10% at 5000ft if needed
	Tuning:
		GST Main
			Unreleased build warning will now auto-close after 5 seconds on startup
			Several notification popups will now auto-close after 3 seconds
		GST Upgrades
			Download GST message updated to notify of background process that will complete when done
		GST Menu
			About details updated
			Update Feedback form to include contact info if the user wants a response
			All forms now have an icon to match that of their menu icon
		3rd Video Support
			With 3 640x360 videos, the bottom (3rd) video is no longer stretched horizontally

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Altitude Adjustment
			Altitude can be set from the Stats window if not recorded (such as FSX 2020) and saved to the GST session file
			Altitude for a Session can be adjusted in the Stats window to have all shot data and charts be recalculated for training, competitions, or exporting a specific altitude shot matrix
				Altitude calculations currently using +10% per 5000ft
				Adjusting the altitude will not save over the original (or once set) GST session file value
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Altitude Support
			Altitude captured during a Session (such as FSX Play) will now be shown in both the main Session details and the Stats Panel Session details
				The altitude value will be included in the header of the PNG Stat image export
				The altitude value will be included in the PNG and CSV Stat export filenames
	Tuning:
		GST Main screen
			License checks now always performed on startup regardless of "Check For Updates on Startup" setting
			"Check for update" error messages cleaned up
		GST Upgrades
			Old versions of GST will be cleaned up during an upgrade
		GST Menu
			Dedicated "Send Tip" URL added if you just want to send a tip and help the cause!
			Patreon URL updated to a dedicated GST Patreon membership page
		GST License Request
			You can now supply contact information to get an EVAL license through Discord, golfsimulatorforum.com, email or other

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		GST Main screen
			"No updates are available" popup message no longer shown each time on startup
				A message will be shown on startup if an update is available and "Check For Updates on Start" is setting is enabled (default)
	Tuning:
		Video Players
			FFMPEG download now checks the downloaded version more thoroughly to eliminate unneeded upgrade prompts

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - PRO:
		3rd Video Support
			You can now add a 3rd video to your video export. It will be placed in a slot below your top two videos and above the shot data in the exported video.
			Enabled from the Settings menu -> Include 3rd Video (disabled by default)
	Bug Fixes:
		Video playback rate under 100% with 2x fps than monitor refresh rate
			You can now play any loaded video at any speed rate
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Support all video types
			You can now load any video type into GST
			AVI swing videos from FSX Play are now supported for frame by frame stepping as well as restricted video sync stepping (see warning popup)
		Synchronize frame by frame stepping of mixed frame rate videos
			You can now step mixed frame rate videos frame by frame and they will be in sync
	Tuning:
		Global Changes
			Only one instance of GST is allowed to run at a time
			Loading splash screen added when starting GST
			All screens and popups adjusted for large resolution screens
			Added session date ranges: 90 days, 180 days
			You can now close Important News, About, Release Notes, License Request and Bug Report popups with ESC key
			Club Override button width adjusted after changing club/ball values
		Session Loading
			Warning popup shown to warn for the initial FSX 2020 catalog build
			Session loading performance increased dramatically
		Video Playback
			Replay "Load Video" and "Remove Video" buttons converged into one "Load Replay" button
		Video Export
			New video export file naming convention: {shot_date}_{#_of_videos}[_REPLAY]
			Removed "Don't Ask Again" prompt when output folder opened after video export

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Bug Fixes:
		With club/ball override enabled, the first shot of a new session loses the original club/ball recorded values
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		PRO: Club & Ball Label Override - Session Stats
			Right-click on a AVG Row Club/Ball to bulk change or restore all labels for that group
	Tuning:
		Sim Software running check is now monitored by a dedicated thread and not via user actions for better accuracy

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Bug Fixes:
		Session Stats - Shots Table
			Sorting by column loses the current selected shot
			Reset Sort loses the default shot order
			Show/Hide Disabled Shots button loses selected shot
			Changing Club/Ball label loses the current selected shot
			Sorting by Club puts the Overall rows at the top when sorting DESC
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Session Stats
			When opening the Stats window for the first time, the initial stat shot selected will be set to shot already selected
			Subtitle under the Session Date has been adjusted to show the correct "Filtered" count when hiding disabled shots
		Session Stats - Shots Table
			Minimum column width set for when re-sizing columns. Enabled and ID are locked down, Club and Ball columns are now frozen
			Enable/Disable all shots bulk edit prompt now has a "Cancel" option
			Stats rows have been adjusted to have matching colors, cleaner labels and proper Standard Deviation indicators
			Column sorting glyphs now use an image to indicate sort direction and default to Descending on first sort
		Session Stats - Export
			Export PNG Subtitle updated to show the current total of filtered "Shots" (not the entire Session) and the "Enabled" count of the filtered shots
			The stats table will now be centered and not stretched when the stats window is resized before Exporting a PNG image
			Export popup has been simplified to include the export option action since the second context menu now removed
			Export PNG image has been cleaned up to include column sorting images and a new border color
			An export filename that includes all shot data will have "full" appended to the end
	Tuning:
		GST Session Data
			Hole outs in FSX Play will now show as 0 for Distance to Pin and Offline since the actual values recorded are a little below the ground and maybe a little left or right down in the cup...

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - PRO:
		Club & Ball Label Override
			Using the GST custom Golf Bag, you can now customize club and ball labels within your sessions. Assign personalized names to clubs and/or balls for better organization and grouping of shots by right-clicking on the selected shot's club or ball cell. The original club and ball names are saved, so you can easily restore them if needed. This feature is available for both FSX Play and FSX 2020 GST sessions
			You can also override club and ball labels during active session monitoring. When you select a custom club or ball name before a shot is recorded, the override will be applied to the incoming shot data
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Session label now includes the number of clubs and/or balls used if more than 1 found
	Tuning:
		Session Stats
			A dedicated Stats chart can now be opened for each player per session
		Session Data
			FSX Play shot timestamps generated by GST adjusted to better support shots recorded in a Session before GST Session Monitoring along with switching players during a monitored session

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Settings -> Configure Golf Bag
			Build your GST Golf Bag with any Clubs and/or Balls you will use (in the future) for testing, practice, gaming, etc.
		Visualize/Compare Session Stats
			Instantly visualize shot statistics by club and ball, with interactive, physics-calculated charts
				Charts updated live as you enable/disable or filter shots
			Ball flight chart will label each Apex
			Dispersion chart will label the Offline range
			Filter and compare multiple club/ball combinations, with an interactive legend and color-coded groupings
			Resize each Chart and Legend area as needed
			Export your charts and data to PNG for sharing or further analysis
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Session Stats
			ESC key closes the stats form
			Option to export only AVG/STDEV/OVERALL rows
	Tuning:
		Session Stats
			Stats form focus behavior improved when already open

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		View & Export Session Stats
			New window can be opened for each Session with filtering (by club/ball, show/hide disabled), sorting (by column - ascending/descending) of shot data (will be updated as new shots are made in a monitored live session)
				Shots can be enabled/disabled (can also use spacebar on highlighted row) to provide adjusted stats
					Double-click any AVG enabled checkbox cell to batch DISABLE or ENABLE the entire combo set
				Data columns can be moved to the desired order (this order will be lost if you close the stats window)
			Export formats supported: PNG, CSV
				Optional note can be added to the export filename
	Tuning:
		UI Cleanup After Simulation Software Change
			Session/Shot labels no longer stay visible (with no data showing) after changing Simulation Software
		Shot Data Precision
			Putts usually don't get a proper Peak Height value in Play
			With no club markers, Play reports incorrect default Club Head Speeds
		FSX Play timestamp warning will now only be shown once per GST runtime

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Keyboard shortcuts to control swing video playback
			Pressing spacebar with videos loaded will Play/Pause them
			Pressing Left/Right arrow keys will step video forward/back one frame
		Ability to disable swing videos from export

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Add DirectShow Camera Setting Support
			Now you can adjust your web camera settings (especially for FSX Play, using FSX Play to preview adjustments) and they will be saved to GST so they can be loaded back for the next session
				DirectShow settings are system wide, so other apps that use the cameras (like FSX 2020, Skype, etc.) will change these values and leave them, so it's best to load your custom settings before each GST session if the Simulation Software doesn't support camera settings
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Play Sound When Video Export Is Done
			To help notify that the export is done and the system is ready to record another shot (the simulation software will be greatful as well)
		Add Menu Quick Launch For Simulation Software
			To help maintain the workflow of starting GST first, with Session Monitoring, and then starting the Simulation Software, you can click on the new menu button on the top right
				CTRL-S shortcut will also start the sim!

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Bug Fixes:
		Hitting a second FSX Play Practice shot while the Practice Hole Order warning dialog is still up shows harmless error
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Pressing Enter on the License Request form will complete submission
		Shot processed sound played when making a change in FSX Play session (Club Change [Bag], Player Change, Hole Change, etc.)
			If you start a FSX Play session (make at least 1 shot) and then start GST with Session Monitoring, any changes will cause GST to load the session and play the shot processed sound

Feature progression, things not currently supported, or known issues for this version will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Support for FSX Play
			Session/Video files must be captured with Play running as they are deleted after the session is completed
		Session Monitoring To Copy Content to Local GST Folder
			Each simulation software has different behaviors, but long term plan for analytics can be spread across sessions from multiple softwares when the data is local to GST
				FSX 2020 Session Files will be available after uninstall/re-install
				FSX 2020 Swing Video files will be available after ending session (known bug - v8.8.0.15)
				FSX Play Session Files will be available after ending each session
				FSX Play Swing Video files will be avilable after exiting Play
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Automatic Session Monitoring Enabled
			Can be turned off in Settings, but recommended to automatically capture data local for future reference/analytics and also required for some sim softwares
		Catalog File Structure Changed to Year -> Month -> Day
			All Exported and Copied content is now stored in a date cataloged directory layout for future reference
		GST Demo now Simulation Software selection
			Also Default Simulation Software selection when first running GST
		Play sound for last shot loaded from session monitoring
	Tuning:
		Processing a new shot with Session Monitoring and a Video Export running will now process the entire swing video(s)
			Doing this is not recommended, but if your system has enough horsepower, yrmv

Feature progression and things not currently supported will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following has been addressed in this version:
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Unselect "Append Shot Replay" after shot change
			Helps when changing to a different shot and doing an export and forgetting to unselect the replay
		Add auto repeat to swing video playback
			Keep that perfect swing on a constant loop!
	Tuning:
		Videos no longer continue to play while export is running
		"Append Shot Replay" cannot be selected without a shot replayed loaded
		Shot Replay video can now be removed from the UI
		Data grids not shown if data isn't captured (Example: Ball mode w/ no club data)

		All dialog messages cleaned up for consistency

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		Download "Demo" session data, swing videos and shot replay
			Download Demo Data from the Help menu
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Session dates to load can be set via user setting - Default: Last 7 Days
			Helps session loading performance for users with years of sessions...
		Missing video information will be gathered during Export if needed
			Saves having to restart GST if you download FFMPEG during the session after loading all 
	Tuning:
		Session will not be loaded/re-loaded when setting the Swing Video directory
		Session drop down will get focus after clicking Load Session to use keyboard down to move to next session to click Load Session again
		Current session will be unloaded when you select Reload Sessions from the File menu
		Added modal screen for Loading All Sessions
			Systems with years of sessions can take a while...

The following has been addressed in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		A new submenu, Unit of Measurement (Imperial/Metric), has been added to a new Settings menu to choose which units the shot data will be shown as.
			Current restrictions published in Important News
	Bug Fixes:
		Incorrect video search timestamp won't load swing videos
		Multiple sessions on the same day are sorted by player name, not timestamp
		Sessions with videos not showing the Video indicator in the Sessions list
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		Simulation Software menu is now a sub menu under Settings
		Video Play button does nothing now when videos are not stopped or paused
		Tab Index has been reset for all existing controls

Initial Release!

Feature progression and things not currently supported will be shown in the "Important News" popup if applicable.

The following are available in this version:
	New Features - BASIC:
		FSX2020 sessions are currently supported.
			Each session will have 1 to many shots that can be selected. Found videos will automatically be loaded.
			Any shot data recorded by LM device will be populated.
		FSX2020 swing Videos are currently supported (FSX2020 only natively supports 2 cameras).
		A custom session folder can be selected if the default FSX2020 directory is not desired.
		A custom swing video can be selected if the default FSX2020 directory is not desired.
		Swing video offsets for each found video can be set to sync to taste.
		Linked video control will Play, Pause, Stop, or Step forwards and backwards for both videos.
		A single shot replay can be loaded with it's own offset to trim it's length
		An upgraded license can be requested from the menu. A Discord account is currently required.
		Options for Donations or purchasing a Patreon membership for even more benefits are available in the menu.
		Feedback, Bug Reports, and/or Enhancement Requests can be submitted from the menu.
	New Features - PRO:
		Each shot can be exported to a merged video with sync'd videos and the option to append the shot replay to the end. Shot data will be applied to the bottom of the merged video.
	Bug Fixes:
		None
	Performance/QoL Improvements:
		None
